text: Plateau-des-Petites-Roches is a commune in the Isère department in southeastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint-Hilaire (the seat), Saint-Bernard and Saint- Pancrasse.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Isère department ==References== *INSEE statistics Category:Communes of Isère Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Plateau-des-Petites-Roches
